issue.title: "DeletingPods - With no errors" takes a long time

content.raw: I believe the upload of log files occurs during `DeletingPods` so it could be that there is a lot data being uploaded although I don't think that should take 11 hours.  I'm running some tests on Cloudsim now and I'll ping back here with an update after I get results.  Unfortunately I got `AdminReview` whenever I kicked off some runs on Friday or I'd already have an answer for you!
content.html: I believe the upload of log files occurs during DeletingPods so it could be that there is a lot data being uploaded although I don't think that should take 11 hours. I'm running some tests on Cloudsim now and I'll ping back here with an update after I get results. Unfortunately I got AdminReview whenever I kicked off some runs on Friday or I'd already have an answer for you!
